name: Tae'lur Alexis
bio: Tae'lur Alexis is a Front-End Engineer and Content Creator with a passion for making coding accessible for everyone. She's also the Founder of Code Everyday, an online platform she's building to help developers with a nontraditional background find their place in tech.

talks.title: CodeEveryday: Turning your side project into a startup
talks.desc: Documenting one's journey of learning how to code and transitioning into tech led to a desire to help others on their journey. And that's how CodeEveryday was founded. Now I want to share my journey of going from self taught developer to founder and share my lessons, failure and motivation to other developers seeking to turn their side project into a startup!
